author: dejanb
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3038 - delete temp destinations when connection is closed

author: spepping
msg: Avoid deconstructing and reconstructing the base URI of the
configuration; the location string is obtained from a sax.Locator with
system ID, line number and optionally column number
and can be used as a URI string directly.

msg: On the 'uris-as-urls' branch, add another helpful API function (which
